title: Add documentation
body:
This PR adds documentation to the Sawtooth Java SDK. It is heavily based on the documentation already published for the Python and JavaScript SDKs. 

To build the documentation:

1. You need [sphinx](http://www.sphinx-doc.org/en/stable/index.html) installed.
2. Run `pip install sphinx_rtd_theme` to install the theme that is used in the Sawtooth docs.
3. Inside the `docs` folder and run `make html` to build the documentation
4. Still inside the `docs` run `open build/html/index.html`  to open the index file

title: Update smoke test docker-compose.yaml to include devmode engine
body:
Smoke tests are failling as the validator image being pulled
from docker hub is version 1.1 and it needs a consensus engine.
This commit adds the devmode engine to the network to fix this issue.

Signed-off-by: Eloá França Verona <eloafran@bitwise.io>

title: Add XO Android example
body: This PR adds an example of an Android client for the XO transaction processor. By running the app the user can see all games in state, see the current state for a particular game, make a move and create a new game. The example is at ` examples/xo_android_client`

body:
The jdk8 jars are needed for Android.

The jdk8 jars are needed for Android.

Increment pom versions for tagging of repo

This increments the poms to v0.1.2-SNAPSHOT where the version file is
0.1.2.

Signed-off-by: Boyd Johnson <bjohnson@bitwise.io>

title: Add README.md
body:
This PR adds a README.md that has 3 important pieces of information
 * The download locations for all three components of the sawtooth-sdk-java
 * The examples available
 * General information needed to work on the java sdk.

title: Add a release profile to the parent pom
body:
This release profile provides the correct plugins for attaching a source
jar, attaching a javadoc jar, and gpg siging both for deploying to
Central Repository.

Signed-off-by: Boyd Johnson <bjohnson@bitwise.io>

title: Add metadata, standardize group id necessary for publishing to Central Repository
body: https://central.sonatype.org/pages/requirements.html#sufficient-metadata This lists the requirements for metadata.

title: Break java sdk into modules
body:
The artifact id is now `sawtooth-sdk-java` which contains three modules
* sawtooth-sdk-signing
* sawtooth-sdk-protos
* sawtooth-sdk-transaction-processor

There are several small fixes:
* ~peg the maven version used in docker files due to a inconsistency between maven 3.5.4 and jdk 8. https://stackoverflow.com/questions/53010200/maven-surefire-could-not-find-forkedbooter-class~
* ~Remove unneed protobuf dependency from xo and intkey~

title: Update dockerfiles (fixes public key repo error and docker-compose.yaml)
body: This fixes the public key error in accessing the sawtooth apt repo for python test dependencies and provides a single docker-compose.yaml entry point.

title: Align java signing with the other sdks
body:
This aligns the java signing functionality with that of Rust and Python. ~The sign method is similar to the legacy class, and unimplemented is the verify method. I will continue to work on this, but I wanted to put forward interfaces.~

All methods are tested and implemented.

title: Change checkstyle to a modified Sun checkstyle.xml
body:
The modifications with respect to the Sun checkstyle are:
 - the line length is 120 characters.
 - empty lines are not counted in the method length check.

title: Revamping of the Java SDK.
body:
To further parallelize the effort on the Java SDK, modularization will be helpful.

* Beginning of the topological changes.
* Signature code and tests runnable.
* Java 10

Resolves: #STL-1427

See also: #STL-1175  #STL-461 #STL-504
